title: Dance with teletubbies
creator_credit: BBC, Ragdoll Productions, Anne Wood, Andrew Davenport, Vic Finch and David G. Hillier
brief_description: Teletubbies is a TV show that originated on the BBC and has proven to be especially popular among younger children. Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po live in a magical land over the hills and far away, where television comes from - a land where anything can happen. Come and dance with the Teletubbies as they discover how to move their bodies to music!
